message: I propose we divide the $10000 with an 80/20 split in favor of you, Bob. I believe this is fair considering the potential risk of inflation.
I believe a 90/10 split is fair, considering the potential for inflation. I'm willing to take a risk, but I think this is a good starting point for a mutually beneficial outcome.

Considering the inflation risk, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains a reasonable balance while still providing a significant portion of the funds to you, Bob. I hope this offer is more acceptable.
